name: @glassc/styles
description: Personal style guide with Nord color palette and Ghost Journal-inspired design patterns

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp docs/index.html dist/ && cp styles.css dist/ && cleancss styles.css -o dist/styles.min.css
scripts.build:dev: npm run build && (chokidar 'styles.css' 'docs/**/*' -c 'npm run build' &) && http-server dist -p 8080 -o
scripts.docs:publish: npm run build && gh-pages --dist dist --cname styles.chrisglass.dev
scripts.docs:publish:dry: npm run build && rm -rf node_modules/.cache/gh-pages && gh-pages --dist dist --cname styles.chrisglass.dev --no-push

author: Chris Glass
